title: Employment Competency Enhancement Program through Sustainability Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and introductory understanding of sustainability concepts
context.additional_context: Customized Learning Design Leveraging Workplace Experience and Enhanced Accessibility via Smartphone-Based Content

learning_goals: Learners can analyze science-related job cases linked to the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and clearly explain sustainability awareness.
Learners can reconstruct their work experience into a job portfolio by applying it to a sustainability storytelling framework.
Learners can convert sustainability competencies acquired through mobile-based microlearning into specific job performance scenarios.

resources: Job Application Case Study Video (5 minutes or less)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
